title: NEW 55+ COMMUNITY - Single-level cottage w/ a VIEW ^^^
map_address: 3602 N. Narrows Drive near N. 37th Street
posting_body: Luxury single-level apartment homes with attached garages, in a beautiful 55+ gated community!
StoneRidge at the Park offers craftsman-style apartment homes in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Tacoma!
Residents will enjoy the serenity of mountain, park, city and water views; and the close proximity to shops, restaurants, Point Defiance Park, and the charming Proctor area!
Nestled among eight acres of beautifully landscaped grounds and across the street from a city park, StoneRidge offers the perfect setting to relax and enjoy life.
Take comfort in your charming single-story cottage, complete with lovely front porches, vaulted ceilings, private patio and garden area, gas fireplace, attached 1-car garage, and plenty of storage!
Cottages come with all appliances, including a full-size washer and dryer.
Don't bother packing the lawnmower; at StoneRidge, we take care of the yard and property maintenance, so that you can enjoy the things you love.
We welcome four-legged friends with a $500 pet fee for one pet and an additional $250 for a second pet.
The pet fee allows up to two small.
Each must weigh less than 35 lbs.
